trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing input languages in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel.
From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages.
The following dialog appears.
![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.")
Gets an enumerator for currently available input languages.
An enumerator for currently available input languages, or **null** if no input languages are available.
This property has no default value.
Gets the input language manager associated with the current context.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref> object associated with the current context.
This property has no default value.
Gets or sets the current input language.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the currently selected input language.
This property may not be set to **null**.
The default value is <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture"></xref>.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the input language.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the input language for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref>.
The current value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Occurs when a change of input language is completed.
Occurs when a change of input language is initiated.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage"></xref> attached property.
Registers an input language source with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
An object that specifies the input language to register.
This object must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource"></xref> interface.
Raised when inputLanguageSource is **null**.
Report the completion of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the new input language.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the previous input language.
Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
Report the initiation of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the new input language.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the previous input language.
**true** to indicate that the reported change of input language was accepted; otherwise, **false**.
Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref> attached property.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage"></xref> attached property.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object representing the new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref> dependency property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref>.
A Boolean value to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage"></xref> attached property to.
Raised when target is **null**.
